alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:46AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phelps, Kearney and southwestern Buffalo Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 245 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Odessa, or 10 miles southwest of Kearney, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Axtell around 300 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Minden and Norman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 260 and 271. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
